title: I have done my 12th standard from NIOS board. Is IIM take students from NIOS board? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bro a big Noooo !! compare with my case I have completed my Bsc from private (distance learning) from Amity University ( a big brand university) fulfilled all eligibility criteria . I have 78% in my graduation I successfully get admissions in fms delhi ( not in IIM because not have work experience) now the story begins I started studying MBA and didn’t face any problem but at the time of placement I got to know 🥵 that my graduation degree value is zero 😭😭😭😭 bro this college will serve you a lot as placement and business studies but you have to face just think about yourself where you are going u will get IItians and top college students what the value of a private student there . In my suggestion leave you 12 board nobody will ask whether nios or any other board but focus more on your graduation . If you want to pursue you graduation from distance learning then go for DU and try to get at least 80+% not any other university or ignou and all . I am facing the biggest mistake of my life 😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭

NIOS board is a recognised board same as any other board like CBSE,ICSE and etc but some colleges deny admission to students who have completed their HSC from NIOS so you will have to check with the respective college whether they are recognising your board
